name: Wick (itch) (meld)
description:
Welcome to Wick!

Thanks for trying this game.

It's still a work in progress and it would be awesome if you could leave feedback or donate if you can.

But most of all, enjoy!

This is a local 2-6 player game, so you need a friend or 5.

You can have up to 4 players using one keyboard, but that gets a bit tight!.   To space out your buddies, you can always use multiple keyboards and joy-pads are also supported.

How to play
  1. Drop a bomb
  2. Run away
  3. Collect the thing
  4. Fire, bad
